summary: Provides a TensorFlow implementation of the GraphSAGE convolutional layer, supporting multiple neighbor aggregation strategies (mean, GCN, pooling, LSTM), optional dropout, bias, activation, and normalization, and works for both homogeneous and bipartite graphs.
business_intent: Enables developers to incorporate scalable graph representation learning components into TensorFlow models for tasks such as node classification, link prediction, and graph embedding within the DGL ecosystem.
